p: The methods used in this study are based on three components: experimental protocols, tabulation of methane absorption spectra, and models that are all used in combination to calculate the shortwave direct radiative forcing by CH 4. The calculations were designed to compute the direct and unadjusted shortwave forcing due to an increase in CH 4 concentrations from 806 to 1760 ppbv under idealized cloud- and aerosol-free clear-sky conditions.
